Review.Titre: Had a good experience buying from Endless

Based on his recommendation I wound up buying a different product.My only complaints were with UPS. They were Horrible.If you buy from Endless, make sure to ask them to ship with DHL.

Review.Titre: US Based and Takes Credit Cards
Review.Contenu: Love the fact that I can use a credit card. Besides getting the points on my card, it gave me security knowing that I could always get my money back. Also the fact that they are US based (I also live in the US) I didn't have to deal with tariffs. That is a huge plus on a 10K purchase. Once it shipped I had it 2 days later. Would definitely use again.

It's been 10 days and so far I've had 100% uptime. They were in communication with me through WhatsApp the entire process. Will recommend and possibly purchase through them again in the future.

Review.Titre: The best and easiest asic purchase I…
Review.Contenu: The best and easiest asic purchase I have ever made. The prices are super competitive and the speed of processing and shipping is faster than most asic sellers. In an industry where one can easily be scammed by fake websites and companies, Endless Mining can be trusted.
Have placed multiple orders with them. All delivered as promised and with excellent communication along the way!

Review.Titre: Customer Service Excellence Through Action (and words)
Review.Contenu: My experiences with Endless Mining have consistently been exceptional, with completely smooth transactions until a recent product failure, which was unequivocally not their fault.Electronics, by their nature, can encounter unpredictable issues, and despite numerous problem-free orders, I finally ran out of my good luck and naturally encountered a faulty product from the manufacturer. However, it's essential to stress that this was entirely beyond the control of Endless Mining.What was in their control and truly distinguishes Endless Mining is their remarkable response to the situation. Throughout the entire process, their communication was prompt, considerate, and exceptionally diligent. Their troubleshooting efforts were thorough, inventive, and they provided an unprecedented level of personal attention. The team, especially Agustin, made me feel genuinely valued as a customer, surpassing typical service standards. It's imperative to emphasize that the fault did not lie with Endless Mining. Instead, they saw this as an opportunity to display an unparalleled commitment to their customers. They didn't merely acknowledge the issue; they took proactive measures, demonstrating their dedication to rectifying every aspect under their control.In circumstances where electronic failures occur (inevitably), the pivotal factor in my opinion is the company's response. Endless Mining exhibited unwavering support, care, and dedication, setting an extraordinary standard for customer service. I wholeheartedly applaud Endless Mining for their exceptional efforts. For those in search of similar products, you need someone who will help you navigate the bumps along the road, so I strongly recommend experiencing their exceptional commitment firsthand.

I had an exceptional experience with EndlessMining that surpassed all expectations. Their communication throughout the entire process was exemplary, ensuring that every detail was clear and well-addressed. I was impressed by their prompt responses and willingness to provide assistance whenever needed.Moreover, the speed at which they processed my request was remarkable. Not only did they deliver on time, their efficiency was truly commendable.What stood out the most was their unwavering trustworthiness. They demonstrated integrity and reliability, earning my complete trust in their services. I felt confident and secure throughout the entire transaction.Overall, I highly recommend them for their outstanding communication, lightning-fast processing, and unwavering trustworthiness. Agustin and Zain - thank you so much!
Easy process. No Hidden fees. Working product. Accepts many forms of payment.
